section.title: Hands-on lab
section.p:
The
Tasks Hands-on Lab is a
repository that contains sample files, code examples, and exercises to help you configure
and learn to use it in a safe environment. For more information, see the puppetlabs/tasks-hands-on-lab repository.

section.title: Online training
section.p:
Learn to run tasks everywhere you need them, when you need them. Our free, online self-paced training gets you up and running with the open-source task runner and Tasks for . For more information, go to
learn.puppet.com.
